version_description:
- Removed iOS 6 support
- Fixed background Bluetooth disconnect issue
- Fixed miscellaneous bugs.

- Add audio alerts
- Removed iOS 7 support
- Added Bluetooth device selector
- Minor bug fixes

- Added support for V1 Gen2.
- Added eSAVVY muting functionality.
- Background Mode is now an app-wide setting.
- Improved iPhone X & 11 support.
- Removed iOS 9, 10 & 11 support.

- Bug fixes
- Improved support for V1 Gen2
